1.0.name: wordpress/push-syndication
1.0.description:
Push syndication plugin helps users to manage posts across multiple sites. It’s very useful when managing posts in different platforms like a WordPress.com blog or a standalone WordPress install. It scales very well and with a single click you can push a post to more than 100 sites of different platform. Currently WordPress.com blogs and standalone WordPress blogs are supported and we have plans to extend it to other platforms as well.

The plugin have a settings page along with an API generator tool that can be used to generate API tokens needed to push content in a WordPress.com blog. In the settings page you can select the post types you want to push and whether to delete the posts pushed when the master post is deleted.
